title: Ex-MUSHROOMHEAD Members Team Up For A Tour Celebrating Their Former Band's Material
description: A Killer's Confession will provide the backing band. The post Ex-MUSHROOMHEAD Members Team Up For A Tour Celebrating Their Former Band's Material appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 2 hours ago
excerpt: A Killer's Confession will provide the backing band.
text: Four former Mushroomhead members will team up for a tour aptly named A Horrifying Trip Back To The 2000's this April. The quartet in question is: Vocalist Jason "J Mann" Popson, who played for Mushroomhead between 1993 and 2004, and then again between 2013 and 2022 Vocalist Waylon Reavis, who played for Mushroomhead between 2004 and 2015 Drummer and samples guy Rick "St1tch" Thomas, who played for Mushroomhead between 2001 and 2022 Percussionist and Daniel "Lil' Dan" Fox, who played for Mushroomhead between 2009 and 2012 All four will be backed by Reavis' band A Killer's Confession, and will see support from opening acts VentanA and Aeternum. The admat for the poster also gives away some of the setlist, noting they'll be playing old hits like "Sun Doesn't Rise", "Solitaire Unraveling", "Bwomp", "Qwerty". So if you've been dying to hear some old-school Mushroomhead done by some of the dudes that were there for it, here ya go. The tour runs as follows. 4/2 Covington, KY Madison Live4/3 Springfield, MO The Riff4/4 Tulsa, OK The Shrine4/6 Houston, TX Scout Bar4/7 Austin, TX Come And Take It Live4/8 Dallas, TX Trees4/10 Lubbock, TX Jake's4/11 Roswell, NM The Liberty4/12 El Paso, TX The Rockhouse4/14 Glendale, AZ The 44 Sports Grill & Nightlife4/15 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick4/16 West Hollywood, CA Whisky a Go Go4/19 Salt Lake City. UT Leatherheads4/21 Grand Junction, CO Mesa Theater4/22 Denver, CO HQ4/24 Colorado Springs, CO Sunshine Studios4/25 Kansas City, MO Vivo Live4/26 Lincoln, NE 1867 Bar4/27 Sioux Falls, SD Bigs Bar4/28 Des Moines, IA Lefty's Want More Metal? html:
Four former Mushroomhead members will team up for a tour aptly named A Horrifying Trip Back To The 2000's this April. The quartet in question is:

  • Vocalist Jason "J Mann" Popson, who played for Mushroomhead between 1993 and 2004, and then again between 2013 and 2022
  • Vocalist Waylon Reavis, who played for Mushroomhead between 2004 and 2015
  • Drummer and samples guy Rick "St1tch" Thomas, who played for Mushroomhead between 2001 and 2022
  • Percussionist and Daniel "Lil' Dan" Fox, who played for Mushroomhead between 2009 and 2012

All four will be backed by Reavis' band A Killer's Confession, and will see support from opening acts VentanA and Aeternum. The admat for the poster also gives away some of the setlist, noting they'll be playing old hits like "Sun Doesn't Rise", "Solitaire Unraveling", "Bwomp", "Qwerty". So if you've been dying to hear some old-school Mushroomhead done by some of the dudes that were there for it, here ya go. The tour runs as follows.

4/2 Covington, KY Madison Live
4/3 Springfield, MO The Riff
4/4 Tulsa, OK The Shrine
4/6 Houston, TX Scout Bar
4/7 Austin, TX Come And Take It Live
4/8 Dallas, TX Trees
4/10 Lubbock, TX Jake's
4/11 Roswell, NM The Liberty
4/12 El Paso, TX The Rockhouse
4/14 Glendale, AZ The 44 Sports Grill & Nightlife
4/15 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick
4/16 West Hollywood, CA Whisky a Go Go
4/19 Salt Lake City. UT Leatherheads
4/21 Grand Junction, CO Mesa Theater
4/22 Denver, CO HQ
4/24 Colorado Springs, CO Sunshine Studios
4/25 Kansas City, MO Vivo Live
4/26 Lincoln, NE 1867 Bar
4/27 Sioux Falls, SD Bigs Bar
4/28 Des Moines, IA Lefty's
